title: Marketing Communications at UC San Diego IT Services
description: Developing and executing comprehensive communication strategies for IT Services, including weekly internal newsletters and the Process Palooza website. Managing content creation, web updates, and promotional materials across digital and print platforms while ensuring brand consistency and accessibility compliance.

title: Community Growth at Tech Voice Indonesia
description: Leading community engagement initiatives for a tech community of 1,600+ members. Conducted market research to identify pain points and designed product offerings including AI courses, career prep workshops, and language programs. Developed quarterly roadmaps for events and created marketing collateral to drive member engagement and satisfaction.

title: Business Development for MSMEs
description: Conducted comprehensive market research to uncover growth opportunities in the MSME sector. Led outreach campaigns and delivered persuasive presentations to potential clients. Worked on projects including a Point of Sales Dashboard for CV Pandumedia Mulya Sejahtera and Web E-commerce platform for CV Gas Pol Indonesia.

title: Campaign Management at Perempuan Masa Depan ID
description: Managed end-to-end execution of webinars and national campaigns celebrating Women's Day and Indonesian holidays. Led outreach to speakers and sponsors, developed creative kits for Instagram campaigns, and analyzed event performance through KPI reports to improve future outcomes.

title: Edtech Business Strategy for Telkom Indonesia
description: Led business model development for Pijar Mahir, a digital upskilling platform. Created Lean Canvas, pitch decks, and strategic recommendations. Researched partnership opportunities with government agencies and developed pricing strategies to enhance revenue optimization in the competitive edtech landscape.

title: Tourism & Digital Marketing with AIESEC
description: Conducted research on local tourism trends in Malang, identifying promotion opportunities for destinations like Bedengan Camping Ground and Kampung Warna Warni Jodipan. Led multimedia campaign creation for Dona Doni Rattan Gallery, enhancing their digital marketing presence through videos and strategic content.

title: Startup Incubation at Bangkit Academy
description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design go-to-market strategies for a mobile-based mental health platform. Conducted user testing, developed product positioning, and coordinated promotional campaigns across multiple channels.

title: CSR and Social Impact Program
description: Coordinated social responsibility initiatives focusing on education and women empowerment. Partnered with NGOs to launch campaigns that provided scholarships and entrepreneurship training for local communities.

title: Content Development for Youth Empowerment Portal
description: Planned and wrote content for a youth empowerment platform focusing on personal growth, digital literacy, and entrepreneurship. Designed social media calendars and optimized SEO for blog content.

title: Research and Innovation Fair UGM
description: Managed logistics, promotion, and participant engagement for the annual UGM innovation exhibition. Designed digital brochures and improved event visibility through social media campaigns.

title: Creative Design Intern at Local Startup
description: Supported the creative team in producing digital and print design materials for brand campaigns. Assisted in logo design, promotional videos, and social media templates for client projects.

title: Campus Magazine Editor
description: Led a team of student writers and designers to publish a quarterly campus magazine. Oversaw content curation, layout design, and distribution both online and offline.

title: Volunteer for Local Literacy Movement
description: Organized reading sessions for underprivileged children and managed book donation campaigns. Created storytelling events to promote literacy awareness.

title: Event Promotion for Student Entrepreneurship Fair
description: Supported the marketing team in promoting student entrepreneurship exhibitions through posters, flyers, and online campaigns. Assisted in sponsor outreach and booth coordination.

title: Public Relations for Campus Debate Club
description: Handled media relations, managed club announcements, and coordinated debate event promotions. Increased member participation through effective storytelling and outreach.
